references.paper_title: CIDAR: Culturally Relevant Instruction Dataset For Arabic
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial dataset for training and evaluating Arabic LLMs in medical applications, directly addressing the scarcity of high-quality Arabic medical data.

references.paper_title: MEDITRON-70B: Scaling Medical Pretraining for Large Language Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a significant large language model specifically trained for medical applications, providing a strong benchmark for other models in the field.
This paper introduces the Llama 3 family of models, which are used extensively in the research and form the basis of many experiments conducted in the study.

references.paper_title: MEDIC: Towards a Comprehensive Framework for Evaluating LLMs in Clinical Applications
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel comprehensive benchmark (MEDIC) for evaluating medical LLMs, setting a new standard for evaluating performance across various clinical tasks.

references.paper_title: PubMedQA: A Dataset for Biomedical Research Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces PubMedQA, a widely used dataset for evaluating question-answering models in the biomedical domain, which is used as a basis for creating Arabic medical datasets in this study.
